sqlMap.select:
SELECT Z.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM019', G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) PRT_AT_CODE_NM , G.GIS_ASSETS_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_NM , G.GIS_ASSETS_MNG_DEPT_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_OPER_DEPT_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC , G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM , G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB , G.GIS_ASSETS_AR , G.GIS_ASSETS_USAGE_YN , G.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR , G.GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_CD , C.ENTRPS_CNT , C.USAGE_AR , C.FEE , C.RDCXPT_FEE , CASE WHEN NVL(C.USAGE_AR,0) > 0 AND NVL(G.GIS_ASSETS_AR,0) > 0 THEN (NVL(C.USAGE_AR,0) / NVL(G.GIS_ASSETS_AR,0)) ELSE 0 END USAGE_RATIO , (SELECT count(*) FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_E WHERE PRT_CD=G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND ASSETS_CD=G.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND ASSETS_SCD=G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) GIS_STAT
FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F G LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT B.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, B.GIS_ASSETS_CD, B.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, COUNT(A.ENTRPSCD) ENTRPS_CNT, SUM(B.FEE) FEE, SUM(B.RDCXPT_FEE) RDCXPT_FEE, SUM(B.USAGE_AR) USAGE_AR FROM ASSETS_RENT_F A, ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F B WHERE A.PRMISN_YN='Y' AND A.PRT_AT_CODE = B.PRT_AT_CODE AND A.MNG_YEAR = B.MNG_YEAR AND A.MNG_NO = B.MNG_NO AND A.MNG_CNT = B.MNG_CNT
A.ENTRPS_NM LIKE '%' || #entrpsNm# || '%'
TO_DATE(#searchDate#,'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN B.USAGE_PD_FROM AND B.USAGE_PD_TO+1
GROUP BY B.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, B.GIS_ASSETS_CD, B.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ) C ON C.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND C.GIS_ASSETS_CD = G.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND C.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD WHERE 1=1
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode#
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD = #gisAssetsLocCd#
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD = #gisAssetsPrprtySeCd#
ORDER BY G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, G.GIS_ASSETS_CD, G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ) S ) Z WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F G LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT B.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, B.GIS_ASSETS_CD, B.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, COUNT(A.ENTRPSCD) ENTRPS_CNT, SUM(B.FEE) FEE, SUM(B.RDCXPT_FEE) RDCXPT_FEE, SUM(B.USAGE_AR) USAGE_AR FROM ASSETS_RENT_F A, ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F B WHERE A.PRMISN_YN='Y' AND A.PRT_AT_CODE = B.PRT_AT_CODE AND A.MNG_YEAR = B.MNG_YEAR AND A.MNG_NO = B.MNG_NO AND A.MNG_CNT = B.MNG_CNT
A.ENTRPS_NM LIKE '%' || #entrpsNm# || '%'
TO_DATE(#searchDate#,'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN B.USAGE_PD_FROM AND B.USAGE_PD_TO+1
GROUP BY B.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, B.GIS_ASSETS_CD, B.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ) C ON C.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND C.GIS_ASSETS_CD = G.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND C.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD WHERE 1=1
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode#
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD = #gisAssetsLocCd#
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD = #gisAssetsPrprtySeCd#

SELECT TRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(COUNT(*),0), '999,999,999,999')) SUM_CNT , SUM(G.GIS_ASSETS_AR) SUM_AR , SUM(G.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR) SUM_RENT_AR , SUM(C.USAGE_AR) SUM_USAGE_AR , SUM(C.FEE) SUM_FEE , SUM(C.RDCXPT_FEE) SUM_RDCXPT_FEE FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F G LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT B.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, B.GIS_ASSETS_CD, B.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, COUNT(A.ENTRPSCD) ENTRPS_CNT, SUM(B.FEE) FEE, SUM(B.RDCXPT_FEE) RDCXPT_FEE, SUM(B.USAGE_AR) USAGE_AR FROM ASSETS_RENT_F A, ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F B WHERE A.PRMISN_YN='Y' AND A.PRT_AT_CODE = B.PRT_AT_CODE AND A.MNG_YEAR = B.MNG_YEAR AND A.MNG_NO = B.MNG_NO AND A.MNG_CNT = B.MNG_CNT
A.ENTRPS_NM LIKE '%' || #entrpsNm# || '%'
TO_DATE(#searchDate#,'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN B.USAGE_PD_FROM AND B.USAGE_PD_TO+1
GROUP BY B.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, B.GIS_ASSETS_CD, B.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ) C ON C.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND C.GIS_ASSETS_CD = G.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND C.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD WHERE 1=1
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode#
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD = #gisAssetsLocCd#
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD = #gisAssetsPrprtySeCd#

SELECT MAX(G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, MAX(G.GIS_ASSETS_CD) GIS_ASSETS_CD, MAX(G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, MAX(G.GIS_ASSETS_NM) GIS_ASSETS_NM, MAX(G.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR) GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR, MAX(G.GIS_ASSETS_AR) GIS_ASSETS_AR, MAX(G.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC) GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC, MAX(G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM) GIS_ASSETS_LNM, MAX(G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB) GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB, COUNT(A.ENTRPSCD) ENTRPS_CNT, SUM(B.FEE) FEE, SUM(B.RDCXPT_FEE) RDCXPT_FEE, SUM(B.USAGE_AR) USAGE_AR FROM ASSETS_RENT_F A, ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F B, GIS_ASSETS_CD_F G WHERE A.PRT_AT_CODE = B.PRT_AT_CODE AND A.MNG_YEAR = B.MNG_YEAR AND A.MNG_NO = B.MNG_NO AND A.MNG_CNT = B.MNG_CNT AND A.PRMISN_YN='Y' AND B.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND B.GIS_ASSETS_CD=G.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND B.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD AND B.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#PRT_AT_CD# AND B.GIS_ASSETS_CD=#PRT_CD# AND B.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#PRT_SUB_CD# AND TO_DATE(#searchDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN B.USAGE_PD_FROM AND B.USAGE_PD_TO

SELECT GAM_GETENTRPSNM(A.entrpscd, '1') entrps_nm, SUM(B.USAGE_AR) USAGE_AR FROM ASSETS_RENT_F A, ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F B WHERE 1=1 and a.mng_year=B.mng_year and a.mng_no=B.mng_no and a.mng_cnt=B.mng_cnt AND A.PRMISN_YN='Y' AND B.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#PRT_AT_CD# AND B.GIS_ASSETS_CD=#PRT_CD# AND B.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#PRT_SUB_CD# AND TO_DATE(#searchDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN B.USAGE_PD_FROM AND B.USAGE_PD_TO GROUP BY A.entrpscd
